name: Mad Memoires VIII: Feast and Famine
description:
In which the Mad King cries, "Let them eat candy corn!"
—These old bones are caught in the gullet, where laughing rises from sorrow. (Site #7)

name: Mad Memoires I: Boyhood
description:
In which His Royal Madness, yet but a boy, discovers the joys of humor.
—Dig deep in the muck, where all the garbage of Lion's Arch flows. (Site #1)
—Find Provernic, where the first king's bones rot in the hills. (Site #5)

name: Witch's Outfit
description:
Contains a Witch's Outfit, which is usable in combat, and a Broom toy for costume brawl.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Mad Memoires IV: Deadly Adventures
description:
In which Os and his elder brother, Ewie, get into a sticky situation. Only one returns.
—Deep in the muck, where all the garbage of Lion's Arch flows. (Site #1)
—Search the dead streets and forgotten thoroughfares of another Lion's Arch. (Site #2)

name: Mad Memoires XI: Flames of Renewal
description:
In which a rebellious village goes up in flames.
—Walk in cadence with King Thorn's shattered subjects. They keep their hatred deep within. (Site #10)

name: Mad Memoires III: Young Love
description:
In which Os woos Lady Lyrica with graceless verve and uncomfortable silences.
—Go into the hills and set down black roots in stagnant waters. (Site #4)
—Find Provernic, where the first king's bones rot in the hills. (Site #5)

name: Mad King Chest
description: Open to receive treats from the Mad King. Has a good chance to give Halloween crafting materials and transform tonics as well as a rare chance to give Halloween skins for weapons and shoulders.

name: Limited-Use Mad King Finisher
description: Have the last laugh with this Mad King finishing move in PvP and WvW.

name: Spooky Ghost Tonic
description: Double-click to transform into a ghost. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Custom Arena Starter Kit
description: Used to create a new PvP Custom Arena with 30 days of playing time. Double-click to open the "Create a Custom Arena" panel.

name: Mad Memoires X: Tax-o'-Lanterns
description:
In which the king makes an example of ungrateful peasants.
—Green is the color I want to remember. Not the red of flames or the blackened plateau. The bridge, even it was green. (Site #9)

name: Mad Memoires V: Betrothed
description:
In which Lord Oswald Thorn, the new heir to the throne, chooses his queen.
—Say more now and look more where Kryta's descendants are buried. (Site #3)
—Find Provernic, where the first king's bones rot in the hills. (Site #5)

name: Limited-Use Scarecrow Finisher
description: Feed your opponents to the birds with this scarecrow finishing move in PvP and WvW.

name: Mad Memoires XII: Descension
description: In which Mad King Thorn is scattered to the four winds and departs for the Underworld.</c>

name: Spooky Zombie Tonic
description: Double-click to transform into a zombie. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Custom Arena Time Token
description: Used to add one day of time to a Custom Arena. Used from your Custom Arena management panel or double-click while playing in any Custom Arena to add time to that arena.

name: Mad Memoires VI: Coronation
description:
In which His Royal Madness ascends to the Krytan throne and wields his first decree.
—Search the dead streets and forgotten thoroughfares of another Lion's Arch. (Site #2)
—Say more now and look more where Kryta's descendants are buried. (Site #3)

name: Spooky Skeleton Tonic
description: Double-click to transform into a skeleton. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Vallog's Demise
description:
"I should have never left the raft."
—Vallog

name: Limited-Use Gift Finisher
description: Crush your opponents with a stack of gift boxes by using this finishing move in PvP and WvW.

name: Infinity Loop
description: <c=@flavor>A single twist in the band creates a continuous surface.</c>

name: Alpha Conduit
description: <c=@flavor>A mysterious clear liquid runs through it.</c>

name: Triple-Luck Tonic
description: <c=@flavor>Wealth, fame, and power—a recipe for success. One drink gives you what most people can't achieve in a lifetime.</c>

name: Candy-Powered Matter Meter
description:
This device detects power caches by attuning its frequency to one of the four types of matter: aqueous, gaseous, etheric, and corporeal. Activation requires at least one piece of candy corn.
"Tassi, where are you going with those blueprints? Those are Statics property! Hey!"
—Councilor Ludo

name: Mad Memoires VII: Handless
description:
In which King Thorn relieves thieves of their hands.
—This hinterland village was home to a goddess and a martyr. (Site #6)

name: Claw of the Howling King
description: <c=@flavor>A tiny sound still emanates from the ring.</c>

name: Mad Memoires IX: Pains of Love
description:
In which Zola's father is afforded special hospitality during her engagement to King Thorn.
—The landing at Arca struggles to fill its storeroom so it will never starve again. (Site #8)

name: Limited-Use Snowman Finisher
description: Freeze your opponents with this snowman finishing move in PvP and WvW.

name: Mad Memoires II: Friendship
description:
In which a friend joins young Oswald Thorn for the adventure of a lifetime.
—Say more now and look more where Kryta's descendants are buried. (Site #3)
—Go into the hills and set down black roots in stagnant waters. (Site #4)

name: Stargazer Pendant
description: <c=@flavor>The jotun have many secrets. This is but one.</c>

name: The Replicator
description: <c=@flavor>A mostly faithful reproduction of Tazza's design, though it doesn't work.</c>

name: Plague
description: <c=@flavor>Waves of darkness emanate from this twisted ring.</c>

name: Eternal Flame
description: <c=@flavor>The flame is untouched by the wind.</c>

name: Koda's Gift
description: <c=@flavor>The symbol of Koda: a serrated oval, reminiscent of the jaws of a bear.</c>

name: Bloodstone Fragment
description:
"That's not really made of blood, is it?"
—Anonymous Child

name: Tortured Root
description: <c=@flavor>Gnarled and knotted, this root is still strong.</c>

name: Operative's Creed
description:
"Objective 1: Find them. Objective 2: Destroy them."
—First Page of the Operative's Creed.

details.description:
Gain +200 condition damage for 30 seconds when you kill a foe. (This effect does not stack)
+70 Precision
+10% Experience from kill

name: Recipe: Claw of the Howling King
Black Lion Chest Key
description: This key will unlock one Black Lion Chest. Black Lion Chests can be found randomly on enemies or in hidden places in the world.

name: Arcane Converter
description: Used by the Mystic Forge to convert arcane components.

name: Endless Karka Tonic
description: Double-click to become a young karka for 5 minutes.

name: Karka Tonic
description: Double-click to become a karka for 5 minutes.

name: Potion of Young Karka Transformation
description: Double-click to become a young karka for 5 minutes.

name: Prototype Sheath
description: <c=@flavor>Protects your back, at least in theory.</c>

name: Mad Memoires: Complete Edition
description:
A recollection of the life and deeds of Mad King Thorn, as told by his loyal subjects and friends. Contains a complete account of King Oswald Thorn's life, from boyhood to gruesome death.
"Even after death, I shall return! And all my enemies will burn, burn, BURN!"
—Mad King Thorn

name: Fuzzy Quaggan Hat with Bow
description:
Town clothes can no longer be equipped separately.

Speak to a Black Lion Armor Trader in any major city to exchange this for a helmet skin with the same look.

name: Witch's Hat
description:
Town clothes can no longer be equipped separately.

Speak to a Black Lion Armor Trader at the trading post in any major city to exchange this item for an outfit wearable in combat.

name: Wizard's Hat
description:
Town clothes can no longer be equipped separately.

Speak to a Black Lion Armor Trader in any major city to exchange this for a helmet skin with the same look.

name: Mad Memoires
description:
A recollection of the life and deeds of Mad King Thorn, as recounted by his loyal subjects and friends. The volume ends with the coronation of King Thorn. It seems incomplete.
—Stories yet untold despite the tower that marks a spooky site. When humans flee their home of old, where they settle cannot be told.
